title: Himi 109
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ka ‘oho mai ‘a māmani
‘Eiki ke ofi mai;
Pea ke fa’a fakahaofi
Hoku laumālie.
2.
Ko e fu’u mālohi koe,
Pea lahi hake;
‘I he ngaahi mālohi,
‘O heli kotoa.
3.
Pea u hanga hake, ‘Eiki
Ki ho fu’u mo’unga;
‘I he ‘amanaki lelei,
Te ke malu’i au.
4.
‘E ‘Otua anga’ofa,
Fakaongoongo lelei;
‘A e huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko ho ‘Alo ia.
5.
Ko e huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Ko e kalofanga;
Ki he kakai mafasia,
‘I he ‘enau hia.
6.
Ko e huafa ko ia,
Ko e paami ia;
Ki he tu’utāmaki ia,
Mo e houhau ia.
7.
He ko e me’a faito’o,
Ki he laumālie;
Ko ia pē ‘oku ‘aonga,
Pea ma’ungofua. *
